metadata.name: No More Dailies
metadata.description:
REQUIRES REPENTOGON
Adds new triggers for the achievements usually requiring daily runs.
Cracked Crown requires a regular 5 win streak. Broken Modem requires 7 total victories. Dedication requires 31 total runs.
The items can still be unlocked via regular means.
Alternative unlock methods (selectable using modconfigmenu): Regular streak/wins/runs -> Random character streak/wins/runs Total runs for dedication -> # total achievements unlocked
All numbers can also be tweaked using modconfigmenu
